Uses of Interface
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download.BasisDownloadInstructions.Instructions

  • Packages that use BasisDownloadInstructions.Instructions 
    Package Description
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download
    Contains utilities for downloading bitmaps and binding them to ImageView or any widget which can display a Bitmap.

    • Uses of BasisDownloadInstructions.Instructions in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download

      Classes in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download that implement BasisDownloadInstructions.Instructions 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BasisDownloadInstructions.AbstractInstructions<BitmapClass extends DownloadContracts.Bitmapable,ViewClass extends DownloadContracts.Viewable>
      An implementation of the BasisDownloadInstructions.Instructions, which returns the bitmapUid as an URL, and which does not present any temporary nor local bitmap.
      static class  BasisDownloadInstructions.SimpleInstructions<BitmapClass extends DownloadContracts.Bitmapable,ViewClass extends DownloadContracts.Viewable> 
      static class  DownloadInstructions.AbstractInstructions
      An implementation of the DownloadInstructions.Instructions, which returns the bitmapUid as an URL, and which does not present any temporary nor local bitmap.
      static class  DownloadInstructions.Instructions
      Enables the bitmap downloader to know on how to handle a command.
      static class  DownloadInstructions.SimpleInstructions
      A very simple implementation of the DownloadInstructions.Instructions, which by-passes the persistence option.
